definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]
everything in disorder (idiom); in a hideous mess/at sixes and sevens
the world in chaos/troubled times/(in Buddhism) the mortal world

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 請叫那男孩別在房間裏亂碰亂撞。

sentences.english: Don't lack the ball about. Can't you see it is crowded here?
sentences.chinese: 不要亂踢球，你看不見這兒很擠嗎？

sentences.english: Selfish picnickers litter the beach with food wrappers.
sentences.chinese: 自私的野餐者亂扔包裝紙使海灘雜亂不堪。

sentences.english: There were books too, we will pack everything and make sure there are clean .
sentences.chinese: 還有圖書哦，雖然現在有點亂，但是我們會打包好哦。

sentences.english: How do I know she won't kick, or bite at my crotch?
sentences.chinese: 我如何確知她不會亂踢亂踹，或咬我的褲襠？

sentences.english: How do I know she won't kick, or bite at my crotch?
sentences.chinese: 我如何確知她不會亂踢亂踹，或咬我的褲襠？

sentences.english: Life can be messy and confusing, but it's also full of surprises.
sentences.chinese: 生活有時亂如麻，讓人困惑，但有時也充滿驚奇。

sentences.english: The tousled clouds have dispersed from the sky.
The boy 's heart fluttered with excitement.
Those mounds were the tombs of poor people before 1945.
sentences.chinese: 那些亂墳堆，都是解放前窮人的墓地。

sentences.english: The first bird to eat this repellant move about nervously and frightening away the rest.
sentences.chinese: 第一隻鳥吃了這種藥劑後就會亂跳飛鳴把其它鳥嚇走。

sentences.english: A whole valley of boulders tossed higgledy-piggledy as though by some giant .
sentences.chinese: 整個山谷裏巨石翻滾，就像有巨人在狂扔亂擲。

sentences.english: Kerry was having a bad hair day, so she decided to wear a hat.
sentences.chinese: 凱芮今天頭髮亂翹，所以她決定要戴頂帽子。

sentences.english: The wind tangled my long hair.
Some years I chaos, in short, is displaced, around rock.
sentences.chinese: 我的歲月有些亂，總之，就是顛沛流離，四處晃盪。

sentences.english: She defaced the book by writing on it.
sentences.chinese: 在書上亂塗寫而損壞了書本。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
